pathAssistantSteps.info:
Please select Client's Preferred Authorization Method and it will be automated to client. This is required for Legal, Compliance and Audit, and can slow down deployment for our clients.


If client cannot accept DocuSign, see this reference guide for Fax and email processes.


Ensure appropriate Certificates and Documents are captured in the related Attachments on this Case!

Client Status:

-Existing - This should apply to the majority of use cases (Established Relationships)

-New - This should be leveraged when new operating units, subsidiaries or partnerships are in play (Additional Workflows Required)


Account Name:

Please Leverage Lookups from the Company Record as that is also the Legal Entity of Record


Confirm Articles of Incorporation in your relevant state:

Alabama Secretary of Stateï»¿

Contact is typically the Business Owner or Senior Executive of the Entity. Additionally typically the Authorized approver for Services.


Administrator is usually the Contact in SMB, but for larger entities is typically the CFO, Treasurer, Office Manager or Book Keepers/Accountant.


Technical Contact - These can be more technically savvy employees that may set up and maintain equipment/software etc. and access is limited to initial setup, then restricted unless needed through approvals later.
Child Cases will be automatically assigned to appropriate case queues. Additionally, in times of high volume Case Teams will be assigned automatically.

Pre-Population from Existing MSA is Quick, but PLEASE DO YOUR PART FOR FRAUD and CONFIRM Correct Tax ID and No Address variants!


Need a Refresher on Fraud Prevention? Just in Time Learning via Trailhead.

Please confirm proper NAICS codes are utilized. These codes play a critical role in our Credit & Risk Rating Models as well as the appropriate fee structures for your client!!


Please Leverage this tool to look up NAICS or confirm Assigned NAICS for your Client.
